00016 #ifndef __CINTERFACECLIENT_H
00017 #define __CINTERFACECLIENT_H
00018 
00019 #include <interface.h>
00020 
00021 // Example ECOM client that uses the InterfaceImplementation plug-ins
00022 // through the InterfaceDefinition (CExampleInterface) interface
00023 class TInterfaceClient
00024         {
00025 public:
00026         // Gets the default implementation of CExampleInterface
00027         void GetDefaultL();
00028 
00029         // Gets a CExampleInterface implementation by requesting
00030         // a specific types of capability
00031         void GetBySpecificationL();
00032 
00033         // Gets all the CExampleInterface implementations
00034         void GetByDiscoveryL();
00035         };
00036 
00037 #endif
